001package org.nasdanika.architecture.c4.gen;
002
003import org.eclipse.emf.common.util.Diagnostic;
004import org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EClass;
005import org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EOperation;
006import org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EPackage;
007import org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EStructuralFeature;
008import org.nasdanika.architecture.c4.C4Package;
009import org.nasdanika.architecture.c4.CodeElement;
010import org.nasdanika.architecture.c4.Component;
011import org.nasdanika.architecture.c4.Container;
012import org.nasdanika.architecture.c4.Person;
013import org.nasdanika.architecture.c4.Relationship;
014import org.nasdanika.architecture.c4.Technology;
015import org.nasdanika.architecture.c4.TechnologyProduct;
016import org.nasdanika.architecture.c4.TechnologyVersion;
017import org.nasdanika.common.Context;
018import org.nasdanika.emf.FunctionAdapterFactory;
019import org.nasdanika.html.emf.ActionProviderAdapterFactory;
020import org.nasdanika.html.model.app.util.ActionProvider;
021
022/**
023 * Provides adapters for the Ecore types - {@link EPackage}, {@link EClass}, {@link EStructuralFeature}, {@link EOperation}, ...
024 * @author Pavel
025 *
026 */
027public class C4ActionProviderAdapterFactory extends ActionProviderAdapterFactory {
028        
029        public C4ActionProviderAdapterFactory(Context context) {
030                super(context);
031        
032                registerAdapterFactory(
033                                new FunctionAdapterFactory<ActionProvider, Technology>(
034                                        C4Package.Literals.TECHNOLOGY, 
035                                        ActionProvider.class, 
036                                        this.getClass().getClassLoader(), 
037                                        e -> new TechnologyActionBuilder<Technology>(e, context) {
038                                                
039                                                @Override
040                                                protected String getHtmlExtension() {
041                                                        return C4ActionProviderAdapterFactory.this.getHtmlExtension();
042                                                }
043                                                
044                                        }.asActionProvider()));
045                
046                registerAdapterFactory(
047                                new FunctionAdapterFactory<ActionProvider, TechnologyProduct>(
048                                        C4Package.Literals.TECHNOLOGY_PRODUCT, 
049                                        ActionProvider.class, 
050                                        this.getClass().getClassLoader(), 
051                                        e -> new TechnologyProductActionBuilder<TechnologyProduct>(e, context) {
052                                                
053                                                @Override
054                                                protected String getHtmlExtension() {
055                                                        return C4ActionProviderAdapterFactory.this.getHtmlExtension();
056                                                }
057                                                
058                                        }.asActionProvider()));
059                
060                registerAdapterFactory(
061                                new FunctionAdapterFactory<ActionProvider, TechnologyVersion>(
062                                        C4Package.Literals.TECHNOLOGY_VERSION, 
063                                        ActionProvider.class, 
064                                        this.getClass().getClassLoader(), 
065                                        e -> new TechnologyVersionActionBuilder<TechnologyVersion>(e, context) {
066                                                
067                                                @Override
068                                                protected String getHtmlExtension() {
069                                                        return C4ActionProviderAdapterFactory.this.getHtmlExtension();
070                                                }
071                                                
072                                        }.asActionProvider()));
073                
074                registerAdapterFactory(
075                                new FunctionAdapterFactory<ActionProvider, Relationship>(
076                                        C4Package.Literals.RELATIONSHIP, 
077                                        ActionProvider.class, 
078                                        this.getClass().getClassLoader(), 
079                                        e -> new RelationshipActionBuilder<Relationship>(e, context) {
080                                                
081                                                @Override
082                                                protected String getHtmlExtension() {
083                                                        return C4ActionProviderAdapterFactory.this.getHtmlExtension();
084                                                }
085                                                
086                                        }.asActionProvider()));
087                
088                registerAdapterFactory(
089                                new FunctionAdapterFactory<ActionProvider, Person>(
090                                        C4Package.Literals.PERSON, 
091                                        ActionProvider.class, 
092                                        this.getClass().getClassLoader(), 
093                                        e -> new PersonActionBuilder<Person>(e, context) {
094                                                
095                                                @Override
096                                                protected String getHtmlExtension() {
097                                                        return C4ActionProviderAdapterFactory.this.getHtmlExtension();
098                                                }
099                                                
100                                        }.asActionProvider()));
101                
102                registerAdapterFactory(
103                                new FunctionAdapterFactory<ActionProvider, org.nasdanika.architecture.c4.System>(
104                                        C4Package.Literals.SYSTEM, 
105                                        ActionProvider.class, 
106                                        this.getClass().getClassLoader(), 
107                                        e -> new SystemActionBuilder<org.nasdanika.architecture.c4.System>(e, context) {
108                                                
109                                                @Override
110                                                protected String getHtmlExtension() {
111                                                        return C4ActionProviderAdapterFactory.this.getHtmlExtension();
112                                                }
113                                                
114                                        }.asActionProvider()));
115                
116                registerAdapterFactory(
117                                new FunctionAdapterFactory<ActionProvider, Container>(
118                                        C4Package.Literals.CONTAINER, 
119                                        ActionProvider.class, 
120                                        this.getClass().getClassLoader(), 
121                                        e -> new ContainerActionBuilder<Container>(e, context) {
122                                                
123                                                @Override
124                                                protected String getHtmlExtension() {
125                                                        return C4ActionProviderAdapterFactory.this.getHtmlExtension();
126                                                }
127                                                
128                                        }.asActionProvider()));
129                
130                registerAdapterFactory(
131                                new FunctionAdapterFactory<ActionProvider, Component>(
132                                        C4Package.Literals.COMPONENT, 
133                                        ActionProvider.class, 
134                                        this.getClass().getClassLoader(), 
135                                        e -> new ComponentActionBuilder<Component>(e, context) {
136                                                
137                                                @Override
138                                                protected String getHtmlExtension() {
139                                                        return C4ActionProviderAdapterFactory.this.getHtmlExtension();
140                                                }
141                                                
142                                        }.asActionProvider()));
143                
144                registerAdapterFactory(
145                                new FunctionAdapterFactory<ActionProvider, org.nasdanika.architecture.c4.Module>(
146                                        C4Package.Literals.MODULE, 
147                                        ActionProvider.class, 
148                                        this.getClass().getClassLoader(), 
149                                        e -> new ModuleActionBuilder<org.nasdanika.architecture.c4.Module>(e, context) {
150                                                
151                                                @Override
152                                                protected String getHtmlExtension() {
153                                                        return C4ActionProviderAdapterFactory.this.getHtmlExtension();
154                                                }
155                                                
156                                        }.asActionProvider()));
157                
158                registerAdapterFactory(
159                                new FunctionAdapterFactory<ActionProvider, CodeElement>(
160                                        C4Package.Literals.CODE_ELEMENT, 
161                                        ActionProvider.class, 
162                                        this.getClass().getClassLoader(), 
163                                        e -> new CodeElementActionBuilder<CodeElement>(e, context) {
164                                                
165                                                @Override
166                                                protected String getHtmlExtension() {
167                                                        return C4ActionProviderAdapterFactory.this.getHtmlExtension();
168                                                }
169                                                
170                                        }.asActionProvider()));
171        }
172        
173        public C4ActionProviderAdapterFactory(Context context, Diagnostic diagnostic) {
174                this(context);
175                this.diagnostic = diagnostic;
176        }
177        
178                                
179}
